review_message: It is an interesting and informative module, providing a lot of information about how to keep your cool while working on the ship. It also focuses on food safety and possible hazzards that need to be avoided at all cost. Good job!
It was a comprehensible module! Thank you for sharing your experience and knowledge about life and work in Norway.

very interesting courses that gave me a lot of really useful information 
I hope it will help me get hired
with much enthusiasm and confidence I move on
It was exciting to learn new things from module 5 as i could find out additional information about working in Norway. Thank you for your enthusiasm time and effort to develop the course.

It was a great to learn so many information  from all of these courses! Very helpful for future employments. Thank you for sharing your experience and knowledge with us. I'm so exited and curious what awaits me.
This is not as easy as it seems. Each module includes a lot of information, I expected everything to be easier! But I'm moving on! A big thank to BFisherman Team!

This module includes a lot of useful information. It's good to know and I'm even more glad that I will have access to this information for a year. Along the way, it will be easy for me to access, having everything in this course. Thank you very much for the work done! Useful and easy to assimilate!

Each past module makes me worry and question whether what I do will be enough to get a job. But I try to stay positive and believe that I am lucky and everything will be fine! A big thank you for the work done to develop this great course!
This unit has provided practical information on how to organize your life and work in Norway and what to do in case of emergency. Thanks a lot!
An informative and very useful module! So each past module gives me a clearer picture of this job. I am very curious and interested in finding out as much as possible. Thanks to the BFisherman team!

This module made me feel closer to Norway. It was not easy, but pleasant. I can't believe that soon I will finish and I will have to send my CV. Thank you very much BFiserman, with your help my wishes will soon come true!

Very useful! This mod is really welcome. There are topics and moments that I didn't even think about that you might encounter during work. I can't stop thanking the BFisherman team for the enormous work done!

A module that I will definitely return to! I am glad that access to the course lasts for one year and I will try to take advantage of this moment. Thanks BFisherman team! I very much hope to get a job and to obtain at least a certificate from those predisposed in module 9.
I am happy, I feel much closer to Norway after this level! I hope to finish and get a job as soon as possible! The BFisherman team never stops thanking you!

I'm getting close to the end and that makes me very happy. Thanks for the bonuses in this module. The information in general is very useful and I am sure that I will open this course more than once! Everything was easy to learn and pass thanks to the efforts of the BFisherman team! Thank you very much!

Finally! BFisherman team, thank you very much for the work done. My expectations from last December were not in vain and they exceeded my expectations. Thank you very much! The BFisherman team has done an incredible job to provide a very useful, informative, current and great product. See you in Norway at work!

If you need to change your life, if you want to change your life, then must get courses from bfisherman. do not even talk any more! just do it!

la prin crabi  ,ajutama sa ajung la voi mersi.

Thank you to the Bfisherman team for the valuable lessons and the additional courses provided. These resources are very helpful in supporting my goals and offer a great opportunity to pursue a new career path in the future. I highly recommend taking as many courses as possible to gain further knowledge and skills.

This has been one of the most interesting modules so far. The knowledge shared is quite useful and something I can apply immediately in my daily routine.

Many thanks as well for the valuable insights, especially on how to improve and level up my social media presence.

Best regards,

Thanks a lot for the detailed module, a lot of useful information about taxes and how to avoid any fines and problems with the local tax police.
appreciated
Thanks a lot for your assistance. I discovered for myself a bunch of useful courses

much useful chapter 
thanks a lot
The experience I had in this course was truly exceptional. I would like to extend my gratitude to the entire team and express my sincere appreciation to Renat for their contributions.
im really happy to my choise with bfisherman , i reached module 2 i¬¥ve learned things that truly matter for my future at sea. big thanks to the bfisherman team
im keep going with 3 module very interested new info i learned
im very happy to much information i learn .very good
